code: import React from'react';import{useForm}from'react-hook-form';import{loginWithEmail}from'./LoginManager';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faEnvelope,faLock}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import SocialMedia from'./SocialMedia';import toast from'react-hot-toast';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignInForm=_ref=>{let{handleResponse}=_ref;const{register,handleSubmit,formState:{errors}}=useForm();const onSubmit=_ref2=>{let{email,password}=_ref2;const loading=toast.loading('Please wait...');loginWithEmail(email,password).then(res=>{if(res.error){toast.dismiss(loading);toast.error(res.error);}handleResponse(res);toast.dismiss(loading);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit(onSubmit),className:"sign-in-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"title",children:"Sign in"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fIcon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faEnvelope})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{defaultValue:"admin@mail.com",placeholder:"Email",...register("email",{required:true})})]}),errors.email&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-warning",children:"This field is required"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"input-field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fIcon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faLock})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{defaultValue:"admin123",type:"password",placeholder:"Password",...register("password",{required:true})})]}),errors.password&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-warning",children:"This field is required"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"iBtn",type:"submit",value:"sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"social-text",children:"Or Sign in with social platforms"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SocialMedia,{handleResponse:handleResponse})]});};export default SignInForm;
